title: Question 1:
description: I claimed my SNX staking rewards but I don't see them in my wallet. Where are my SNX rewards?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: All staking SNX rewards claimed are not tokenized transferable SNX in your wallet until they are ‘vested’ out of escrow which can be done after the 12-month waiting/escrow period. While your rewards are in escrow, they are simply assigned to your wallet address as escrowed SNX which then can be used to further collateralize your staking position and minted upon. Escrowed SNX performs identically to your wallet SNX in terms of anything within the Staking dapp.

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
